- What does this change add or fix?

## Checklist (must be completed)
- [ ] User-facing change documented in the [Wiki](../../projecthub.wiki) or noted below.
- [ ] Includes tests or rationale if tests are not applicable.
- [ ] Lint/typecheck pass locally (`yarn lint`, `yarn typecheck`).
- [ ] No debug-only settings left enabled (e.g., trace level).

## Wiki update note
Link to the wiki change or describe what needs updating.

List commands run (if any) and outcomes.
